Wildfires in Colorado.title: Wildfires in Colorado

Polynya off the Antarctic Coast.caption_short: In some places where ice should cover the sea, open water appears instead.

Israel-Egypt-Gaza border region.title: Israel-Egypt-Gaza border region
Israel-Egypt-Gaza border region.caption_short: A clearly visible line marks about 50 kilometers of the international border between Egypt and Israel.

Suguta Valley, Kenya.title: Suguta Valley, Kenya
Suguta Valley, Kenya.caption_short: These images provide wide-area and close-up views of Suguta, today a mostly dry valley, several thousand years ago a massive lake.

Cerro Hudson Volcano, Chile.title: Cerro Hudson Volcano, Chile
Cerro Hudson Volcano, Chile.caption_short: Volcanic ash from Cerro Hudson Volcano stained the snow of the Chilean Andes in mid-November 2011.

Polynyas and the Pine Island Glacier, An.title: Polynyas and the Pine Island Glacier, Antarctica

Fires in Queenland, Australia.title: Fires in Queenland, Australia
Fires in Queenland, Australia.caption_short: Hazardous fire conditions led to widespread, large fires in Queensland, Australia in mid-November.

Crack in the Pine Island Glacier.title: Crack in the Pine Island Glacier

Blooming Waters off Argentina.title: Blooming Waters off Argentina
Blooming Waters off Argentina.caption_short: At the intersection of two ocean current systems off of Argentina, phytoplankton growth explodes in a spring 2011 bloom.

Low Clouds over Central Europe.title: Low Clouds over Central Europe
Low Clouds over Central Europe.caption_short: Clouds and snow whiten different parts of central Europe in this image from early November 2011.

Re-entry of Progress Spacecraft 42P.title: Re-entry of Progress Spacecraft 42P
Re-entry of Progress Spacecraft 42P.caption_short: Astronauts captured this view of a Progress supply ship streaking across the sky as it re-enters Earth’s atmosphere.

Fresh Lava Flows Surround Pu&rsquo;u &ls.title: Fresh Lava Flows Surround Pu’u ‘O’o

First Light for NPP.title: First Light for NPP

Haze over the Bay of Bengal.title: Haze over the Bay of Bengal
Haze over the Bay of Bengal.caption_short: Haze from northern India migrated toward the southeast, spreading over the Bay of Bengal in early November 2011.

Powerful Storm hits Alaska.title: Powerful Storm hits Alaska

Looking Under Jakobshavn.title: Looking Under Jakobshavn

Lake Orumiyeh, Iran.title: Lake Orumiyeh, Iran
Lake Orumiyeh, Iran.caption_short: Lake Orumiyeh is one of the world’s great salt lakes, but it is shrinking.

Tropical Storm Keila.title: Tropical Storm Keila
Tropical Storm Keila.caption_short: Tropical Storm Keila brought strong winds and heavy rains to the Arabian Peninsula at the beginning of November 2011.

Floods Surround Bangkok.title: Floods Surround Bangkok
Floods Surround Bangkok.caption_short: Acquired in November 2008 and 2011, these images compare conditions in Bangkok, where floods crept toward the city center in 2011.

Growth of Shiveluch Volcano.title: Growth of Shiveluch Volcano
Growth of Shiveluch Volcano.caption_short: Fresh debris avalanches and a growing lava dome on Mount Shiveluch illustrate some of the processes that build stratovolcanoes.

El Hierro Still Churning the Sea.title: El Hierro Still Churning the Sea

Dust Storm in Turkmenistan and Afghanist.title: Dust Storm in Turkmenistan and Afghanistan
Dust Storm in Turkmenistan and Afghanist.caption_short: Acquired in early November 2011, this natural-color image shows a dust storm blowing over the Turkmenistan-Afghanistan border.

Rowley Shoals, Timor Sea.title: Rowley Shoals, Timor Sea

Shades of Green in the North Sea.title: Shades of Green in the North Sea

Where on Earth...?.title: Where on Earth...?
Where on Earth...?.caption_short: Play geographic detective. Take a look at the full image and answer the quiz questions for a chance to win the MISR mystery quiz.

Dust over the Gulf of Alaska.title: Dust over the Gulf of Alaska

Ash from Cerro Hudson, Chile.title: Ash from Cerro Hudson, Chile

Heavy Snow in Northeastern United States.title: Heavy Snow in Northeastern United States
Heavy Snow in Northeastern United States.caption_short: An unseasonably early storm dropped wet, heavy snow from West Virginia to Maine in late October 2011.

Crepuscular Rays, India.title: Crepuscular Rays, India
Crepuscular Rays, India.caption_short: Crepuscular rays stream through the clouds over India, providing scientific and spiritual inspiration.

O&rsquo;ahu, Hawai&rsquo;i.title: O’ahu, Hawai’i

Weather and Climate Meet on NPP Satellit.title: Weather and Climate Meet on NPP Satellite

Looking Inside Hurricane Rina.title: Looking Inside Hurricane Rina

Floods Swamp Historic City in Thailand.title: Floods Swamp Historic City in Thailand

Flooding in Mexico.title: Flooding in Mexico

7.2 Earthquake in Eastern Turkey.title: 7.2 Earthquake in Eastern Turkey

Midwestern USA at Night with Aurora Bore.title: Midwestern USA at Night with Aurora Borealis

Sea Ice and Icebergs off East Antarctica.title: Sea Ice and Icebergs off East Antarctica
Sea Ice and Icebergs off East Antarctica.caption_short: Acquired October 7, 2011, this natural-color image shows an ice menagerie off the coast of East Antarctica.

2011 Antarctic Ozone Minimum.title: 2011 Antarctic Ozone Minimum

Flooding in Northern India.title: Flooding in Northern India

Flooding near Bangkok.title: Flooding near Bangkok
Flooding near Bangkok.caption_short: Acquired October 19, 2011, and November 12, 2008, these false-color images compare conditions around Bangkok, where flooding loomed in late October 2011.

Landslides in Sikkim.title: Landslides in Sikkim

A Kamchatkan Autumn.title: A Kamchatkan Autumn

Grand New View of the Canyon.title: Grand New View of the Canyon
Grand New View of the Canyon.caption_short: New imagery from satellite sensors provides a compelling 3D view of the Grand Canyon.

Namibia&rsquo;s Protected Coast.title: Namibia’s Protected Coast

Discovering America.title: Discovering America

Operation IceBridge Returns to Antarctic.title: Operation IceBridge Returns to Antarctica

Haze over Bo Hai.title: Haze over Bo Hai

Toxic Algae Bloom in Lake Erie.title: Toxic Algae Bloom in Lake Erie

Hurricane Jova.title: Hurricane Jova
Hurricane Jova.caption_short: Acquired October 10, 2011, this natural-color image shows Hurricane Jova off the coast of Mexico.

Old Volcano, Older Footprints.title: Old Volcano, Older Footprints

Evidence of Fresh Lava at Puyehue-Cord\u.title: Evidence of Fresh Lava at Puyehue-CordÃ³n Caulle
Evidence of Fresh Lava at Puyehue-Cord\u.caption_short: Satellite data suggests that fresh lava continues to be emitted at the Puyehue Corón-Caulle Volcanic Complex.

Burn Scar from the Pagami Creek Fire in.title: Burn Scar from the Pagami Creek Fire in Minnesota

Fires along the Rio Xingu, Brazil.title: Fires along the Rio Xingu, Brazil

Parque Nacional Llullaillaco.title: Parque Nacional Llullaillaco

Dunphy Complex Fires, Nevada.title: Dunphy Complex Fires, Nevada

Long Cold Spell Leads to Arctic Ozone Ho.title: Long Cold Spell Leads to Arctic Ozone Hole
Long Cold Spell Leads to Arctic Ozone Ho.caption_short: An unusually long period of cold temperatures and strong winds allowed an Arctic ozone hole to form in March 2011.

2011 Sea Ice Minimum.title: 2011 Sea Ice Minimum

Vast Area Burned in Australia.title: Vast Area Burned in Australia

Typhoon Nalgae.title: Typhoon Nalgae

Flooding in India.title: Flooding in India

Mid-Latitude Cyclone over the United Sta.title: Mid-Latitude Cyclone over the United States

Fire in the Sky and on the Ground.title: Fire in the Sky and on the Ground

Fog over Lake Baikal.title: Fog over Lake Baikal
Fog over Lake Baikal.caption_short: Acquired September 22, 2011, this natural-color image shows fog over Lake Baikal.

&Aring;land Islands.title: Åland Islands

Lava Flows and Volcanic Plume on Etna.caption_short: Mount Etna&rsquos;s 13th paroxysm of 2011 created lava flows and a volcanic plume.

Lightning Fires in Oregon.caption_short: Smoke hangs over central Oregon in this image of widespread lightning fires on August 27.

Flooding along the Mekong River.title: Flooding along the Mekong River
Flooding along the Mekong River.caption_short: Acquired August 13, 2011, and August 16, 2010, these false-color images compare conditions along the Mekong River in Cambodia. Flooding along the river inundated thousands of homes in 2011.

Northwestern Europe at Night.title: Northwestern Europe at Night
Northwestern Europe at Night.caption_short: Several of the oldest cities of northwestern Europe are highlighted in this nighttime astronaut photograph from August 10, 2011.

Franz Josef Land.title: Franz Josef Land
Franz Josef Land.caption_short: Acquired August 17, 2011, this natural-color image shows Franz Josef Land, a 191-island archipelago in the northeastern Barents Sea.

Hurricane Irene Nears Landfall.title: Hurricane Irene Nears Landfall
Hurricane Irene Nears Landfall.caption_short: Irene, the first hurricane of the 2011 Atlantic season, was poised on August 26 to be the first to make land-fall in tU.S. since 2008. More than 50 million people were estimated to lie within the path of the storm.

Lightning Fires in Montana.title: Lightning Fires in Montana
Lightning Fires in Montana.caption_short: Several wildfires burn in southeastern Montana in this image from August 24, 2011.

Super Typhoon Nanmadol.title: Super Typhoon Nanmadol
Super Typhoon Nanmadol.caption_short: Acquired August 26, 2011, this natural-color image shows Super Typhoon Nanmadol over the northern Philippines.

Fires in Montana and Wyoming.title: Fires in Montana and Wyoming
Fires in Montana and Wyoming.caption_short: A veil of smoke hangs over the Upper Midwestern United States in this image taken on August 23. The smoke is from fires in Montana and Wyoming.

Atlantic Heat Source for Hurricane Irene.title: Atlantic Heat Source for Hurricane Irene
Atlantic Heat Source for Hurricane Irene.caption_short: Plenty of warm-water fuel waits in the Atlantic Basin for Hurricane Irene and other tropical storms to build themselves up in August 2011.

The Eye Inside Irene.title: The Eye Inside Irene
The Eye Inside Irene.caption_short: Though no eye was apparent in visible satellite images, patterns of rainfall reveal a fully developed eye at the center of Hurricane Irene on August 23.

Dust and Pollution Rise Before the Monso.title: Dust and Pollution Rise Before the Monsoon
Dust and Pollution Rise Before the Monso.caption_short: In the weeks before India’s monsoon rains, dust, smoke, and haze build over the Ganges River Plain. This image provides a profile of the atmosphere during one of those pollution periods.

Petermann Ice Island-A Splits, Drifts.title: Petermann Ice Island-A Splits, Drifts
Petermann Ice Island-A Splits, Drifts.caption_short: Acquired on the afternoon of August 22, 2011, this natural-color image shows the Petermann Ice Island-A split in two off the Newfoundland coast.

Flooding in the Missouri Basin.title: Flooding in the Missouri Basin
Flooding in the Missouri Basin.caption_short: Acquired July 10, 2011, and July 14, 2010, these false-color images compare conditions along the Missouri River in Kansas and Missouri. The Missouri was flooded in the summer of 2011.

Petermann Ice Island-A in Pieces.title: Petermann Ice Island-A in Pieces
Petermann Ice Island-A in Pieces.caption_short: Acquired August 22, 2011, this natural-color image shows the Petermann Ice Island-A split in two off the Newfoundland coast.

Kaliningrad, Baltic Sea, Russia.title: Kaliningrad, Baltic Sea, Russia
Kaliningrad, Baltic Sea, Russia.caption_short: This ISS photograph captures two great lagoons to the north and south of Kaliningrad, Russia: Vistula Lagoon and Kurshsky Bay.

Liverpool Bay and Tuktoyaktuk Peninsula,.title: Liverpool Bay and Tuktoyaktuk Peninsula, Canada
Liverpool Bay and Tuktoyaktuk Peninsula,.caption_short: Acquired September 2, 2000, this natural-color image shows the area around Liverpool Bay in Canada’s Northwest Territories.

Phytoplankton Bloom in the Great Barrier.title: Phytoplankton Bloom in the Great Barrier Reef
Phytoplankton Bloom in the Great Barrier.caption_short: “The Sea in many places is here cover’d with a kind of a brown scum,” observed Captain Cook of the Coral Sea near Australia. Aqua MODIS made the same observation on August 9, 2011.

First Map of Antarctica&rsquo;s Moving I.title: First Map of Antarctica’s Moving Ice
First Map of Antarctica&rsquo;s Moving I.caption_short: Scientists mapped the motion of Antarctica’s ice sheets and revealed unexpected patterns.

Puyehue-Cord&oacute;n Caulle.title: Puyehue-Cordón Caulle
Puyehue-Cord&oacute;n Caulle.caption_short: Chile’s Puyehue-Cordón Caulle Volcano erupted spectacularly on June 4, 2011, forming a tall ash plume above the cloud-covered Andes.

Fires in Western Idaho.title: Fires in Western Idaho
Fires in Western Idaho.caption_short: Smoke hangs over charred land in this image, taken two days after a summer lightning storm ignited a series of fires in southwestern Idaho.

Looking Down on a Shooting Star.title: Looking Down on a Shooting Star
Looking Down on a Shooting Star.caption_short: Astronauts captured this unusual view of a Perseid meteor descending into Earth's atmosphere in August 2011.

Petermann Ice Island-A Off Newfoundland.title: Petermann Ice Island-A Off Newfoundland
Petermann Ice Island-A Off Newfoundland.caption_short: Acquired August 14, 2011, this natural-color image shows the Petermann Ice Island-A off St. Anthony, Newfoundland, where it had apparently grounded a week earlier.

Island of Crete, Greece.title: Island of Crete, Greece
Island of Crete, Greece.caption_short: Crete is the largest and most heavily populated island of Greece.

Omulyakhskaya and Khromskaya Bays, North.title: Omulyakhskaya and Khromskaya Bays, Northern Siberia
Omulyakhskaya and Khromskaya Bays, North.caption_short: Acquired June 15, 2009, this natural-color image shows Omulyakhskaya and Khromskaya Bays along the coast of Northern Siberia.

Cakaulevu Reef, Fiji.title: Cakaulevu Reef, Fiji
Cakaulevu Reef, Fiji.caption_short: An unusually cloud-free day provided this spectacular view of Cakaulevu Reef, Fiji, the world’s third largest reef system.

Paroxysm at Mount Etna.title: Paroxysm at Mount Etna
Paroxysm at Mount Etna.caption_short: On August 12, 2011, Etna had its tenth paroxysm of the year, spewing a thick white plume of gas and ash into the air.

Runoff Raises Lake Powell.title: Runoff Raises Lake Powell
Runoff Raises Lake Powell.caption_short: Surging with fresh water from heavy winter snow melt, Lake Powell rose significantly in the summer of 2011 after many years of low levels.

Drought across the United States.title: Drought across the United States
Drought across the United States.caption_short: Extreme heat helped push as much as 26 percent of the contiguous United States into drought in July 2011. This image shows the impact on plants throughout the month.

Lateral West Fire, Virginia.title: Lateral West Fire, Virginia
Lateral West Fire, Virginia.caption_short: The Lateral West fire burning in the Great Dismal Swamp in southern Virginia blanketed the beaches of North Carolina with thick smoke on August 10, 2011.

Winter and Summer in the Tarim Basin.title: Winter and Summer in the Tarim Basin
Winter and Summer in the Tarim Basin.caption_short: Acquired January 26, 2011, and August 6, 2011, these images compare conditions in China’s Tarim Basin in winter and summer.

Fire in Great Dismal Swamp, Virginia.title: Fire in Great Dismal Swamp, Virginia
Fire in Great Dismal Swamp, Virginia.caption_short: The dense smoke shown in this image may be the greatest risk posed by the ightning-ignited Lateral West fire burning in southern Virginia’s Great Dismal Swamp.

Antarctic Icebergs Chipped off by Japan.title: Antarctic Icebergs Chipped off by Japan Tsunami
Antarctic Icebergs Chipped off by Japan.caption_short: Scientists observed the calving of several large icebergs from the Sulzberger Ice Shelf in Antarctica as a result of the March 2011 tsunami half a world away in Japan.

Tropical Storm Muifa Makes Landfall.title: Tropical Storm Muifa Makes Landfall
Tropical Storm Muifa Makes Landfall.caption_short: Acquired August 7, 2011, this natural-color image shows Muifa approaching eastern China and South Korea.

Flooding Slowly Recedes along the Souris.title: Flooding Slowly Recedes along the Souris River
Flooding Slowly Recedes along the Souris.caption_short: Acquired August 7, 2011, and July 7, 2011, these false-color images compare conditions along the Souris River, which flooded in the summer of 2011.

Biomass Burning, Southern Africa.title: Biomass Burning, Southern Africa
Biomass Burning, Southern Africa.caption_short: A smoke pall dominates this view of tropical southern Africa, one of the most fire-prone regions of the world.

Eastmain Reservoir, Quebec.title: Eastmain Reservoir, Quebec
Eastmain Reservoir, Quebec.caption_short: Acquired May 19, 2011, this natural-color scene shows a work-in-progress hydroelectric project along the Rupert River in Quebec, Canada.

Heat Wave Across the United States.title: Heat Wave Across the United States
Heat Wave Across the United States.caption_short: This map depicts land surface temperature anomalies for July 20 to 27, 2011, in the midst of a month-long heatwave across much of the United States.

Petermann Ice Island-A off Newfoundland.title: Petermann Ice Island-A off Newfoundland
Petermann Ice Island-A off Newfoundland.caption_short: Acquired August 1, 2011, this natural-color image shows the Petermann Ice Island-A off the northeastern tip of Newfoundland.

Monsoon Transforms the Irrawaddy River.title: Monsoon Transforms the Irrawaddy River
Monsoon Transforms the Irrawaddy River.caption_short: Acquired August 2, 2011, and March 6, 2011, these false-color images compare conditions along part of the Irrawaddy River in Burma, which rises substantially during the summer monsoon.

Lingering Floods in Eastern Nebraska.title: Lingering Floods in Eastern Nebraska
Lingering Floods in Eastern Nebraska.caption_short: Accessed August 1, 2011, these images provide false- and natural-color views of lingering floods along the Missouri River around Blair, Nebraska.

Hurricane Eugene.title: Hurricane Eugene
Hurricane Eugene.caption_short: Hurricane Eugene had just reached category 4 strength when this detailed photo-like image was taken on August 3, 2011.

Sediment in Motion at Ocean City.title: Sediment in Motion at Ocean City
Sediment in Motion at Ocean City.caption_short: Jetties near Ocean City, Maryland, have interrupted natural coastal processes such as longshore transport, altering the shape of the coastline.

Volcanic Acitivity at Krakatau.title: Volcanic Acitivity at Krakatau
Volcanic Acitivity at Krakatau.caption_short: On July 31, 2011, a wispy ash plume rose above Anak Krakatau, site of one of the largest volcanic eruptions of the 19th Century.

Lingering Floods along the James River.title: Lingering Floods along the James River
Lingering Floods along the James River.caption_short: Acquired August 1, 2011, and August 6, 2010, these false-color images compare conditions along the James River, a Missouri River tributary, in South Dakota.

Business as Usual at Kilauea Volcano.title: Business as Usual at Kilauea Volcano
Business as Usual at Kilauea Volcano.caption_short: The world’s longest-lived volcanic eruption, Kilauea, continued on July 30, 2011.

Massachusetts Coastline in Sunglint.title: Massachusetts Coastline in Sunglint
Massachusetts Coastline in Sunglint.caption_short: Bathed in sunlight reflecting on the water, the Massachusetts coast and islands are the focus of this astronaut photograph.

Fires in Arnhem Land, Australia.title: Fires in Arnhem Land, Australia
Fires in Arnhem Land, Australia.caption_short: Smoke drifts over the aquamarine waters off northern Australia in this true color image taken on July 30 as the winter fire season gets underway.

Tropical Storm Don.title: Tropical Storm Don
Tropical Storm Don.caption_short: Tropical Storm Don was approaching southwestern Texas when this true-color image was taken on July 30, 2011.

Burn Scar from Fourmile Canyon Fire.title: Burn Scar from Fourmile Canyon Fire
Burn Scar from Fourmile Canyon Fire.caption_short: Acquired June 7, 2011, these images provide natural- and false-color views of the Fourmile Canyon burn scar west of Boulder, Colorado. Runoff over this burn scar caused flooding a month later.

Dust over Turkey and the Black Sea.title: Dust over Turkey and the Black Sea
Dust over Turkey and the Black Sea.caption_short: Acquired July 30, 2011, this natural-color image shows dust blowing over Turkey and the Black Sea.

Medvezhiy Glacier Advances.title: Medvezhiy Glacier Advances
Medvezhiy Glacier Advances.caption_short: In the early summer of 2011, the Medvezhiy Glacier in Tajikistan slid abruptly down its valley, creating a glacial lake.

Lion Fire, California.title: Lion Fire, California
Lion Fire, California.caption_short: Twenty days after being ignited by lightning, California’s Lion Fire continues to grow.

Petermann Ice Island-A off Labrador.title: Petermann Ice Island-A off Labrador
Petermann Ice Island-A off Labrador.caption_short: Acquired July 28, 2011, this natural-color image shows the Petermann Ice Island-A drifting in the Labrador Sea, within 30 kilometers of Belle Isle.

Dust over Iraq, Syria, and Turkey.title: Dust over Iraq, Syria, and Turkey
Dust over Iraq, Syria, and Turkey.caption_short: This true-color image shows a cloud of dust over Iraq, Syria, and Turkey. Although source points for the storm are not obvious, the dust appears to blow toward the northwest.

Where on Earth? MISR Mystery Image.title: Where on Earth? MISR Mystery Image
Where on Earth? MISR Mystery Image.caption_short: Play geographical detective: Where on Earth is this image?

Ice Island Drifts Southward.title: Ice Island Drifts Southward
Ice Island Drifts Southward.caption_short: Acquired July 27, 2011, this natural-color image shows the ice island PII-A off the coasts of Labrador and Newfoundland.

Wildfire Smoke over the Sea of Okhotsk.title: Wildfire Smoke over the Sea of Okhotsk
Wildfire Smoke over the Sea of Okhotsk.caption_short: Acquired July 27, 2011, this natural-color image shows smoke from wildfires over the Sea of Okhotsk.

Comet Atlantis.title: Comet Atlantis
Comet Atlantis.caption_short: Space Shuttle Atlantis streaked across the sky to its final landing at Kennedy Space Center.

Fires in Northern Argentina.title: Fires in Northern Argentina
Fires in Northern Argentina.caption_short: Fires are scattered across the Gran Chaco in this image of northern Argentina taken on July 25, 2011.

Texas Drought Disaster.title: Texas Drought Disaster
Texas Drought Disaster.caption_short: Severe drought has taken a serious toll on vegetation and farmers in Texas, New Mexico, and Oklahoma.

Smoke from Fires in Northwest Territorie.title: Smoke from Fires in Northwest Territories, Canada
Smoke from Fires in Northwest Territorie.caption_short: Acquired July 25, 2011, this natural-color image shows smoke from wildfires blowing eastward across Canada.

Heavy Snow in Central Chile.title: Heavy Snow in Central Chile
Heavy Snow in Central Chile.caption_short: Acquired July 22, 2011, and July 8, 2011, these false-color images compare conditions around Lonquimay, Chile, which was buried in several feet heavy snow.

Fires in Northwest Territories, Canada.title: Fires in Northwest Territories, Canada
Fires in Northwest Territories, Canada.caption_short: Dense smoke pours from a cluster of wildfires in this image of Northwest Territories, Canada, taken on July 23, 2011.

Dust off the Libyan Coast.title: Dust off the Libyan Coast
Dust off the Libyan Coast.caption_short: Acquired July 23, 2011, this natural-color image shows dust blowing off the Libyan coast near Misratah.

Aras River, Turkey-Armenia-Iran Border R.title: Aras River, Turkey-Armenia-Iran Border Region
Aras River, Turkey-Armenia-Iran Border R.caption_short: Taken July 8, 2011, this astronaut photograph shows the border region of Turkey, Armenia, and Iran, including the Aras River.

Record Runoff into the Missouri Basin.title: Record Runoff into the Missouri Basin
Record Runoff into the Missouri Basin.caption_short: This color-coded map shows rainfall anomalies in the western United States in May 2011. Rainfall in May contributed to record runoff into the Missouri River Basin in June 2011.

Severe Drought Causes Famine in East Afr.title: Severe Drought Causes Famine in East Africa
Severe Drought Causes Famine in East Afr.caption_short: This map of the most recent growing season in East Africa reveals the poor conditions that led to famine in parts of Somalia and a food emergency in Somalia, Ethiopia, Kenya, and Djibouti.

Ice Island Calves off Petermann Glacier.title: Ice Island Calves off Petermann Glacier
Ice Island Calves off Petermann Glacier.caption_short: Acquired July 22, 2010, this high-resolution image shows cracks on the surface of the Petermann Glacier in northwestern Greenland.

Rainfall from Typhoon Ma-on.title: Rainfall from Typhoon Ma-on
Rainfall from Typhoon Ma-on.caption_short: This color-coded image shows the storm track and rainfall amounts associated with Typhoon Ma-on in July 2011.

Hurricane Dora.title: Hurricane Dora
Hurricane Dora.caption_short: Acquired July 20, 2011, this natural-color image shows Hurricane Dora off the coast of Mexico.

July Snow in the Uinta Mountains, Utah.title: July Snow in the Uinta Mountains, Utah
July Snow in the Uinta Mountains, Utah.caption_short:
A cold spring and unusually snowy winter led to this uncommon
view of winter snow on Utah’s Uinta Mountains in July.

Dust Plumes over the Red Sea.title: Dust Plumes over the Red Sea

Sun Rising on the Final Shuttle Mission.title: Sun Rising on the Final Shuttle Mission
Sun Rising on the Final Shuttle Mission.caption_short: Astronauts supplied the International Space Station with a new logistics module; tested tools, technologies, and techniques to refuel satellites in space; and collected old equipment.

Sunny Skies over Arctic Sea Ice.title: Sunny Skies over Arctic Sea Ice
Sunny Skies over Arctic Sea Ice.caption_short: Acquired July 11, 2011, this mosaic shows Arctic sea ice through largely cloud-free skies.

Flooding near Hamburg, Iowa.title: Flooding near Hamburg, Iowa
Flooding near Hamburg, Iowa.caption_short: Acquired on June 14, 2011, these images show flooding along the Missouri River near Hamburg, Iowa.

Valle Grande, New Mexico.title: Valle Grande, New Mexico
Valle Grande, New Mexico.caption_short: Acquired May 25, 2011, this natural-color image shows the site of a sediment core that cast light on ancient megadroughts affecting the American Southwest.

Typhoon Ma-on.title: Typhoon Ma-on
Typhoon Ma-on.caption_short: On July 15, 2011, the MODIS instrument on NASA's Aqua satellite captured this view of Typhoon Ma-on.

Tropical Storm Bret.title: Tropical Storm Bret
Tropical Storm Bret.caption_short: Acquired July 17, 2011, this natural-color image shows Tropical Storm Bret off the east coast of Florida.

Shoemaker Impact Structure, Western Aust.title: Shoemaker Impact Structure, Western Australia
Shoemaker Impact Structure, Western Aust.caption_short: The Shoemaker impact site in Australia may have been formed as long as 1.63 billion years ago.

Two Views of the Painted Desert.title: Two Views of the Painted Desert
Two Views of the Painted Desert.caption_short: Acquired March 28, 2009, these images provide two views of Arizona’s Painted Desert.

Dust over Afghanistan.title: Dust over Afghanistan
Dust over Afghanistan.caption_short: A pale plume of dust blew out of the dried Sistan Wetlands of Afghanistan and Iran on November 15, 2009.

Dust Storm over Algeria.title: Dust Storm over Algeria
Dust Storm over Algeria.caption_short: Acquired July 15, 2011, a natural-color satellite image shows a complex pattern on the upper surface of an Algerian dust storm.

Final Hook-Up.title: Final Hook-Up
Final Hook-Up.caption_short: Space Shuttle Atlantis approaches the International Space Station for docking for the last time on July 10, 2011.

Dust over the Red Sea and Gulf of Aden.title: Dust over the Red Sea and Gulf of Aden
Dust over the Red Sea and Gulf of Aden.caption_short: Acquired July 14, 2011, this natural-color image shows dust over the Red Sea and Gulf of Aden.

Ponds on the Ocean.title: Ponds on the Ocean
Ponds on the Ocean.caption_short: Melt ponds cover the surface of sea ice in the Arctic Ocean off of Alaska.

Rare Snow in Atacama Desert, Chile.title: Rare Snow in Atacama Desert, Chile
Rare Snow in Atacama Desert, Chile.caption_short: These images from July 7, 2011, provide an unusual sight: snow covering one of the world’s driest deserts.

Summer Monsoon Transforms Northeastern B.title: Summer Monsoon Transforms Northeastern Bangladesh
Summer Monsoon Transforms Northeastern B.caption_short: Acquired in late May and early July 2011, these false-color images show changes caused by monsoon rains in northeastern Bangladesh.

Continued Activity at Puyehue-Cord\u00c3.title: Continued Activity at Puyehue-CordÃ³n Caulle
Continued Activity at Puyehue-Cord\u00c3.caption_short: Acquired July 2, 2011, and July 11, 2011, these natural-color images show the plume from Puyehue-Cordón Volcano Complex blowing in different directions.

Dust Storm in the Sahara.title: Dust Storm in the Sahara
Dust Storm in the Sahara.caption_short: Acquired July 10, 2011, this natural-color image shows a dust storm blowing through parts of Algeria and Mali.

Sault Ste Marie, Ontario and Michigan.title: Sault Ste Marie, Ontario and Michigan
Sault Ste Marie, Ontario and Michigan.caption_short: The twin cities of Sault Ste Marie straddle the border of Canada and the U.S. and lie amidst the lakes and islands that separate Lake Huron and Lake Superior.

M&acirc;zab Valley, Algeria.title: Mâzab Valley, Algeria
M&acirc;zab Valley, Algeria.caption_short: Rising out of parched surroundings, the M’zab Valley is filled with palm groves and dotted with centuries-old settlements.

Atlantis Rides Into History.title: Atlantis Rides Into History
Atlantis Rides Into History.caption_short: In July 2011, the Space Shuttle Atlantis lit its rockets and roared into space for the 135th and last flight of the U.S. space transportation system.

A Global Garden: Plants Storing Carbon.title: A Global Garden: Plants Storing Carbon
A Global Garden: Plants Storing Carbon.caption_short: By providing a measurement of all of the carbon being stored in Earth’s plants, maps like these help scientists figure out what happens to the carbon people release by burning fossil fuels.

Flooding Continues along the Souris Rive.title: Flooding Continues along the Souris River
Flooding Continues along the Souris Rive.caption_short: Acquired July 7, 2011, and July 4, 2010, these false-color images compare conditions along the Souris River in North Dakota, where record flooding struck in June 2011.

Dust Storm in Phoenix.title: Dust Storm in Phoenix
Dust Storm in Phoenix.caption_short: Acquired July 6, 2011, this image shows remnants of a powerful dust storm that rolled through Phoenix the previous evening.

U.S. Climate: The New Normal.title: U.S. Climate: The New Normal
U.S. Climate: The New Normal.caption_short: These maps compare January minimum temperatures and July maximum temperatures in the U.S. Climate Normals, a 30-year frame of reference. The new normal reflects a warming world.

Flooding Spreads along the Missouri Rive.title: Flooding Spreads along the Missouri River
Flooding Spreads along the Missouri Rive.caption_short: Acquired June 23, 2011, and July 4, 2011, these false-color images compare flood conditions along the Missouri River. Flooding spread noticeably between these dates.

Logging and Regrowth in Washington State.title: Logging and Regrowth in Washington State
Logging and Regrowth in Washington State.caption_short: This pair of images show patterns of forest clearing and regrowth in Wasghington state over 26 years. Such images help scientists understand how human decisions impact the carbon cycle and Earth’s climate.

Southern Italian Peninsula at Night.title: Southern Italian Peninsula at Night
Southern Italian Peninsula at Night.caption_short: City lights trace the outline of Italy's “boot” and the island of Sicily.

Floods Recede around the Wabash-Ohio Con.title: Floods Recede around the Wabash-Ohio Confluence
Floods Recede around the Wabash-Ohio Con.caption_short: Acquired June 23, 2011, this natural-color image shows the Wabash-Ohio confluence after 2011 spring floods retreated.

Ice Island off Labrador.title: Ice Island off Labrador
Ice Island off Labrador.caption_short: A massive ice island is lingering off the coast of Labrador, Canada, after an 11-month journey from the Petermann Glacier in Greenland.

Dust Plumes over the Persian Gulf.title: Dust Plumes over the Persian Gulf

Flooding Continues along the Missouri Ri.title: Flooding Continues along the Missouri River
Flooding Continues along the Missouri Ri.caption_short: Acquired June 20, 2011, and June 29, 2010, these false-color images compare conditions along the Missouri River, which flooded in 2011.

Lava Flows at Nabro Volcano, Eritrea.title: Lava Flows at Nabro Volcano, Eritrea
Lava Flows at Nabro Volcano, Eritrea.caption_short: This detailed image from June 29, 2011, provides a nearly unimpeded view of lava flows at the erupting Nabro volcano in Eritrea.

Las Conchas Fire, New Mexico.title: Las Conchas Fire, New Mexico
Las Conchas Fire, New Mexico.caption_short: Taken an hour and a half after the Las Conchas Fire started in the mountains southwest of Los Alamos, New Mexico, on June 26, this image shows the large wildfire well underway.

Dust Plumes over Iraq.title: Dust Plumes over Iraq
Dust Plumes over Iraq.caption_short: This true-color image shows a combination of dust and clouds over Turkey, Syria, and Iraq on April 15, 2009.

Flooding in Minot, North Dakota.title: Flooding in Minot, North Dakota
Flooding in Minot, North Dakota.caption_short: Acquired June 25, 2011, this image shows widespread flooding in the city of Minot, North Dakota, as the Souris River was reaching a historic crest.

Continued Flooding near Hamburg, Iowa.title: Continued Flooding near Hamburg, Iowa
Continued Flooding near Hamburg, Iowa.caption_short: This natural-color image shows flood water from breached levees along the Missouri River near Hamburg, Iowa, on June 24, 2011.

Wallow Fire Burn Scar, Arizona.title: Wallow Fire Burn Scar, Arizona
Wallow Fire Burn Scar, Arizona.caption_short: Though the Wallow Fire in the White Mountains of eastern Arizona is not yet fully out, the time to assess and recover has already begun via satellite imagery.

Floods along the Yangtze River.title: Floods along the Yangtze River
Floods along the Yangtze River.caption_short: Acquired June 23, 2011, and May 26, 2011, these false-color images show changes in Dongting and Poyang Lakes, comparing drought to flood conditions.

Floods Advance Down the Missouri River.title: Floods Advance Down the Missouri River
Floods Advance Down the Missouri River.caption_short: Acquired May 30, 2011, and June 27, 2011, these false-color images show the advance of flood waters down the Missouri River over a four-week interval.

Wildfires in Western Canada.title: Wildfires in Western Canada
Wildfires in Western Canada.caption_short: Several large wildfires burn in Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Northern Territories, Canada in this image from June 26, 2011.

Detailed Views of Erupting Nabro Volcano.title: Detailed Views of Erupting Nabro Volcano
Detailed Views of Erupting Nabro Volcano.caption_short: This pair of satellite images was among the first detailed pictures of the erupting vent and lava flows.

Historic Flooding along the Souris River.title: Historic Flooding along the Souris River
Historic Flooding along the Souris River.caption_short: Acquired June 25, 2011, and June 22, 2010, these false-color images compare conditions along the Souris River, which reached a historic crest at Minot, North Dakota in June 2011.

Dust Storm over Northern Afghanistan.title: Dust Storm over Northern Afghanistan
Dust Storm over Northern Afghanistan.caption_short: Acquired June 25, 2011, this natural-color image shows a dust storm over northern Afghanistan and neighboring countries.

Flooding along the Missouri River.title: Flooding along the Missouri River
Flooding along the Missouri River.caption_short: Acquired June 19, 2010, this natural-color image shows flooding along the banks of the Missouri River near the town of Glasgow.

Okavango Swamp, Botswana.title: Okavango Swamp, Botswana
Okavango Swamp, Botswana.caption_short: Sometimes called the Jewel of the Kalahari, the area is an enormous, pristine wetland that almost miraculously appears out of a desert.

Qinghai Cross Section.title: Qinghai Cross Section
Qinghai Cross Section.caption_short: Acquired in December 2010, this natural-color image shows a cross-section of the varied topography of China’s Qinghai Province.

Birthday Wishes for Shenandoah National.title: Birthday Wishes for Shenandoah National Park
Birthday Wishes for Shenandoah National.caption_short: Americans celebrate the 75th anniversary of Shenandoah National Park, just 75 miles from Washington, DC, but worlds away in spirit.

Sediment from the Mississippi Floods.title: Sediment from the Mississippi Floods
Sediment from the Mississippi Floods.caption_short: These maps illustrate how much sediment flowed into the Gulf of Mexico during the floods on the Mississippi River in May and June 2011. The nutrient-rich sediment is expected to contribute to the development of a record dead zone this summer.

Flooding along the Souris River.title: Flooding along the Souris River
Flooding along the Souris River.caption_short: Acquired June 1, 2011, and July 2, 2002, these false-color images compare conditions along the Souris River in North Dakota.

Sediment in the Gulf of Mexico.title: Sediment in the Gulf of Mexico
Sediment in the Gulf of Mexico.caption_short: Sediment-laden water pours into the northern Gulf of Mexico from the Atchafalaya River in this photo-like image taken on April 7, 2009.

Eruption at Nabro Volcano.title: Eruption at Nabro Volcano
Eruption at Nabro Volcano.caption_short: Remote Nabro Volcano, along the border between Eritrea and Ethiopia, emitted a thick plume of volcanic gases on June 15, 2011.

Eruption of Gr&iacute;msv&ouml;tn Volcan.title: Eruption of Grímsvötn Volcano, Iceland
Eruption of Gr&iacute;msv&ouml;tn Volcan.caption_short: Acquired May 22, 2011, this natural-color image shows a plume from Grímsvötn on Iceland.

Smoke from Honey Prairie Complex Fire, G.title: Smoke from Honey Prairie Complex Fire, Georgia
Smoke from Honey Prairie Complex Fire, G.caption_short: Acquired June 20, 2011, this natural-color image shows smoke from the Honey Prairie Complex Fire blowing over the Atlantic Ocean.

Heavy Rains in China.title: Heavy Rains in China

Floods in Northeastern Syria.title: Floods in Northeastern Syria
Floods in Northeastern Syria.caption_short: Acquired April 26, 2011, and April 16, 2011, these false-color images show the Syria-Iraq border before and after floods affected northeastern Syria.

Drought in Texas.title: Drought in Texas
Drought in Texas.caption_short: Most of Texas is brown in this vegetation index image, revealing the negative impact drought had on plants in August 2009.

Heavy Rain in Central United States.title: Heavy Rain in Central United States
Heavy Rain in Central United States.caption_short: This map depicts rainfall for the Midwestern U.S. from April 19 to 25, 2011, when severe rains added to spring melt to bring dozens of rivers above flood stage.

Flood Extent in Pakistan.title: Flood Extent in Pakistan
Flood Extent in Pakistan.caption_short: Derived from satellite data, this map shows the extent of flooding in Pakistan caused by the 2010 monsoon.

Spring Flooding in Manitoba.title: Spring Flooding in Manitoba

Quiescent Mount Etna.title: Quiescent Mount Etna
Quiescent Mount Etna.caption_short: Even while quiescent, Mount Etna—Italy’s most active volcano—shows signs of life.

Bukalo Channel and Lake Liambezi.title: Bukalo Channel and Lake Liambezi
Bukalo Channel and Lake Liambezi.caption_short: Acquired April 16, 2011, this natural-color image shows water flowing through the Bukalo Channel toward Lake Liambezi in easternmost Namibia.

Sunset over Western South America.title: Sunset over Western South America
Sunset over Western South America.caption_short: The changeover between day and night is marked by the terminator, a line on Earth's surface separating the sunlit side from the darkness.

Jizzax Province, Uzbekistan.title: Jizzax Province, Uzbekistan
Jizzax Province, Uzbekistan.caption_short: Acquired September 20 and November 23, 2002, these natural-color images show agricultural fields in Jizzax Province at the end of summer and in late fall.

Earth&rsquo;s Magnetosphere.title: Earth’s Magnetosphere
Earth&rsquo;s Magnetosphere.caption_short: Earth is a great magnet, and scientists have spent a century exploring its shape and structure. This visualization shows the magnetic field around Earth, or magnetosphere.

Spring Floods in Saskatchewan.title: Spring Floods in Saskatchewan
Spring Floods in Saskatchewan.caption_short: Acquired April 21, 2011, and April 21, 2010, these false-color images show widely diverging snowmelt and flooding conditions in Saskatchewan.

Drought and Heat Create Hazardous Fire C.title: Drought and Heat Create Hazardous Fire Conditions in Texas
Drought and Heat Create Hazardous Fire C.caption_short: This temperature map shows the extremely warm temperatures that helped create hazardous fire conditions in Texas in April.

Bottoms Up for Antarctic Ice.title: Bottoms Up for Antarctic Ice
Bottoms Up for Antarctic Ice.caption_short: Researchers working in Antarctica have found evidence of large-scale ice making at the bottom of that continent's massive ice sheets.

Elevation Map of Badain Jaran Desert.title: Elevation Map of Badain Jaran Desert
Elevation Map of Badain Jaran Desert.caption_short: This digital elevation map of the Badain Jaran Desert shows multi-generation dunes, with smaller dunes resting atop larger ones.

Dust Storm in Oklahoma and Texas.title: Dust Storm in Oklahoma and Texas
Dust Storm in Oklahoma and Texas.caption_short: Acquired April 15, 2011, this natural-color image shows dust plumes blowing through Kansas, Oklahoma, and Texas.

Rising Waters along the Red River.title: Rising Waters along the Red River
Rising Waters along the Red River.caption_short: Acquired April 14, 2011, and March 18, 2011, these false-color images show conditions along the Red River in North Dakota, Minnesota, and Manitoba.

Bassas da India in Sunglint.title: Bassas da India in Sunglint

Dust Plumes off Egypt and Libya.title: Dust Plumes off Egypt and Libya
Dust Plumes off Egypt and Libya.caption_short: Acquired on April 16, 2011, this natural-color image shows dust plumes blowing off the coasts of Egypt and Libya over the Mediterranean Sea.

Islands off the Croatian Coast.title: Islands off the Croatian Coast
Islands off the Croatian Coast.caption_short: Acquired October 2, 2002, this natural-color image shows islands off the coast of Croatia, in the Adriatic Sea.

2010 Drought in the Amazon Forest.title: 2010 Drought in the Amazon Forest
2010 Drought in the Amazon Forest.caption_short: This vegetation map shows widespread browning over the Amazon rainforest during the 2010 drought.

Flooding in Angola and Zambia.title: Flooding in Angola and Zambia
Flooding in Angola and Zambia.caption_short: Acquired April 14, 2011, and April 27, 2010, these false-color images compare late rainy season conditions.

Dust Blown from Africa to Scandinavia.title: Dust Blown from Africa to Scandinavia
Dust Blown from Africa to Scandinavia.caption_short: The Ozone Monitoring Instrument (OMI) on NASA's Aura satellite spied dust from a Saharan sand storm blowing several thousand kilometers over the North Atlantic and Europe in April 2011.

Activity at Mt. Etna.title: Activity at Mt. Etna
Activity at Mt. Etna.caption_short: In mid-January 2011, Europe’s largest and most active volcano, Mount Etna, rumbled with new energy and lit up the Sicilian night with a fountain of lava.

Fires and Smoke in North Korea.title: Fires and Smoke in North Korea

Rising Rivers in the U.S. Midwest.title: Rising Rivers in the U.S. Midwest

Large Fires in Northern Mexico.title: Large Fires in Northern Mexico
Large Fires in Northern Mexico.caption_short: This image pair shows two large fires burning in the mountains of northern Mexico on April 3, 2011.

One Pinnacle of Human Achievement to Ano.title: One Pinnacle of Human Achievement to Another
One Pinnacle of Human Achievement to Ano.caption_short: Astronauts on flight STS-1 captured this view of the Tigris and Euphrates through a viewport on the space shuttle during its first flight in April 1981.

Swakop River reaches Atlantic Ocean.title: Swakop River reaches Atlantic Ocean

Kuiseb River Reaches the Sea.caption_short: Acquired April 2, 2011, and February 27, 2011, these natural-color images show rising waters on the Kuiseb River, which flowed all the way to the Atlantic Ocean for the first time in decades.

Flooding across Northern Namibia.title: Flooding across Northern Namibia
Flooding across Northern Namibia.caption_short: Acquired April 12, 2011, and April 22, 2010, these false-color images show differences in rainy season conditions in northern Namibia.

Lingering Floods in Pakistan.title: Lingering Floods in Pakistan
Lingering Floods in Pakistan.caption_short: Acquired on December 15, 2010, September 17, 2010, and December 16, 2009, these false-color images show southern Pakistan before and after the destructive 2010 monsoon season.

Spring Flooding in the Upper Midwest.title: Spring Flooding in the Upper Midwest

Wildfires in Southwest Texas.title: Wildfires in Southwest Texas
Wildfires in Southwest Texas.caption_short: The Rock House Fire stretches in a long line around the town of Fort Davis, Texas, in this true-color image taken on April 10, 2011.

Wildfires in Central Texas.title: Wildfires in Central Texas
Wildfires in Central Texas.caption_short: Taken on April 10, 2011, this true-color image shows two large wildfires burning in central Texas near Lubbock.

Irrigation along the Shebelle River.title: Irrigation along the Shebelle River
Irrigation along the Shebelle River.caption_short: The Shebelle River has its headwaters in the Ethiopian Highlands, and transports water and sediment 1,000 kilometers to the southeast across Ethiopia and into Somalia.

Hobet Mine, West Virginia.title: Hobet Mine, West Virginia
Hobet Mine, West Virginia.caption_short: Multiple layers of coal lie underground in ancient rocks. In some places, miners remove mountaintops to get at it.

Receding Snow Sets Stage for Floods near.title: Receding Snow Sets Stage for Floods near Fargo

Saharan Dust off Europe.title: Saharan Dust off Europe
Saharan Dust off Europe.caption_short: Acquired April 8, 2011, this natural-color image shows dust plumes off the coast of Europe.

Retreating Snow and Advancing Water in t.title: Retreating Snow and Advancing Water in the Upper Midwest
Retreating Snow and Advancing Water in t.caption_short: Acquired April 6, 2011, March 28, 2011, and February 28, 2011, these false-color images show the retreat of snow and advance of water in Minnesota and Wisconsin.

Earthquake and Tsunami near Sendai, Japa.title: Earthquake and Tsunami near Sendai, Japan

Saharan Dust off Portugal.title: Saharan Dust off Portugal
Saharan Dust off Portugal.caption_short: A thick plume of tan dust hangs over the Atlantic Ocean off the coast of Portugal in this image taken on April 6, 2011.

Heavy Rain Triggers Landslides in Thaila.title: Heavy Rain Triggers Landslides in Thailand
Heavy Rain Triggers Landslides in Thaila.caption_short: Numerous landslides mar the hills of southern Thailand in this true-color image from April 4, 2011.

Rising Waters on the James River.title: Rising Waters on the James River
Rising Waters on the James River.caption_short: Acquired April 4, 2011, and March 5, 2011, these false-color images show snow cover retreat and rising rivers in South Dakota.

Thirteen Years of Greening from SeaWiFS.title: Thirteen Years of Greening from SeaWiFS

White Fire, New Mexico.title: White Fire, New Mexico

Two Low Pressure Systems, Northeastern P.title: Two Low Pressure Systems, Northeastern Pacific

Wadi Rum, Jordan.title: Wadi Rum, Jordan

Unseasonably Heavy Rain Floods Thailand.title: Unseasonably Heavy Rain Floods Thailand

Tsunami Floods Linger near Sendai, Japan.title: Tsunami Floods Linger near Sendai, Japan

Arabian Sand Storm.title: Arabian Sand Storm
Arabian Sand Storm.caption_short: A wall of dust barrels across the Arabian Peninsula in these true color images from March 26 and March 27, 2011.

Flying over Arctic Sea Ice.title: Flying over Arctic Sea Ice

Arctic Ozone Loss.caption_short: Recent observations from satellites and ground stations suggest that atmospheric ozone levels for March in the Arctic were approaching the lowest levels in the modern instrumental era.

Rising Waters on the Minnesota and Missi.title: Rising Waters on the Minnesota and Mississippi Rivers
Rising Waters on the Minnesota and Missi.caption_short: Acquired March 27, 2011, and February 28, 2011, these false-color images show rising waters on the Minnesota and Mississippi Rivers.

Cape Verde.title: Cape Verde
Cape Verde.caption_short: Acquired November 23, 2010, this natural-color image shows the islands of the Cape Verde Archipelago off the west coast of Africa.

Central Tien Shan, China.title: Central Tien Shan, China

Tassel n&rsquo;Ajjer National Park.title: Tassel n’Ajjer National Park
Tassel n&rsquo;Ajjer National Park.caption_short: Part of the Sahara Desert, the rocky plateau is rich in geologic and human history.

Fires in Georgia.title: Fires in Georgia
Fires in Georgia.caption_short: Thick plumes of smoke bellow from two large wildfires in southeastern Georgia in this true-color image from March 25, 2011.

Astrolabe Glacier and Unbalanced Ice.title: Astrolabe Glacier and Unbalanced Ice
Astrolabe Glacier and Unbalanced Ice.caption_short: Located in East Antarctica, Astrolabe Glacier streams out from the interior of Antarctica to dump ice into the sea.

Snow in Lebanon.title: Snow in Lebanon
Snow in Lebanon.caption_short: Fresh snow highlights Lebanon’s two mountain ranges in this true-color image from March 17, 2011.

Flooding in Northern Namibia.title: Flooding in Northern Namibia
Flooding in Northern Namibia.caption_short: Acquired March 20, 2011, and March 17, 2010, these false-color images show evidence of unusually heavy precipitation in 2011.

Volcanic Activity at Kilauea.title: Volcanic Activity at Kilauea

Cold Weather Damages Crops in Sinaloa, M.title: Cold Weather Damages Crops in Sinaloa, Mexico
Cold Weather Damages Crops in Sinaloa, M.caption_short: This vegetation image shows extensive damage to crops in Sinaloa, Mexico, following a cold snap in February 2011.

Kuiseb River Nears the Ocean.title: Kuiseb River Nears the Ocean
Kuiseb River Nears the Ocean.caption_short: Acquired February 27, 2011, this natural-color image shows pools of water extending from the Kuiseb River to Walvis Bay, Namibia.

Rising Waters on the Mississippi River.title: Rising Waters on the Mississippi River

Electricity Losses in Northeastern Japan.title: Electricity Losses in Northeastern Japan

Tohoku Earthquake Shaking Intensity.title: Tohoku Earthquake Shaking Intensity
Tohoku Earthquake Shaking Intensity.caption_short: This map shows the ground motion and shaking intensity from the March 11, 2011, earthquake at dozens of locations across Japan.

Tsunami Damage, Rikuzentakata.title: Tsunami Damage, Rikuzentakata

Flooded Coast near Sendai.title: Flooded Coast near Sendai

Tsunami Damage Viewed for the Space Stat.title: Tsunami Damage Viewed for the Space Station

Tsunami Damage near Ishinomaki, Japan.title: Tsunami Damage near Ishinomaki, Japan

High Waters along the Ohio and Mississip.title: High Waters along the Ohio and Mississippi Rivers

Milan at Night.title: Milan at Night

Tsunami flooding near Sendai, Japan.title: Tsunami flooding near Sendai, Japan

Flooding from Tsunami near Sendai, Japan.title: Flooding from Tsunami near Sendai, Japan

Shaking Intensity, Christchurch Earthqua.title: Shaking Intensity, Christchurch Earthquake

Rain Transforms Channel Country.title: Rain Transforms Channel Country

Dust Travels from Iraq to Iran.title: Dust Travels from Iraq to Iran

M&eacute;dano Blanco Coastal Dunes, Arge.title: Médano Blanco Coastal Dunes, Argentina

Colorado National Monument.title: Colorado National Monument

Better ISS Window, Better View of Earth.title: Better ISS Window, Better View of Earth

Earthquake Shakes Ice from New Zealand G.title: Earthquake Shakes Ice from New Zealand Glacier

Early Spring Floods in Indiana.title: Early Spring Floods in Indiana

Fires in Texas.title: Fires in Texas

Ocean Crossroads.title: Ocean Crossroads

Wildfires in Florida.title: Wildfires in Florida
Wildfires in Florida.caption_short: Three wildfires burn near the east coast of central Florida in this image from February 28, 2011.

Pyroclastic Flow Remnants at Shiveluch V.title: Pyroclastic Flow Remnants at Shiveluch Volcano

Dust off West Africa.title: Dust off West Africa

Heavy Rains in Guyana.title: Heavy Rains in Guyana

Pico de Orizaba, Mexico.title: Pico de Orizaba, Mexico

Fires in Maryland and Virginia.title: Fires in Maryland and Virginia

Tropical Cyclone Atu.title: Tropical Cyclone Atu
Tropical Cyclone Atu.caption_short: Acquired February 21, 2011, this natural-color image shows Tropical Cyclone Atu over New Caledonia, Vanuatu, and Fiji.

Dust Plume over the Mediterranean Sea.title: Dust Plume over the Mediterranean Sea

Dust Plumes off Libya and Egypt.caption_short: Acquired February 18, 2011, this natural-color image shows dust plumes blowing off the coasts of Libya and Egypt.

Tropical Cyclone Diane.title: Tropical Cyclone Diane
Tropical Cyclone Diane.caption_short: Acquired February 19, 2011, this natural-color image shows Tropical Cyclone Diane off the coast of Western Australia.

Agricultural Fields near Perdizes, Minas.title: Agricultural Fields near Perdizes, Minas Gerais, Brazil

Sea Ice Surrounds Shikotan.title: Sea Ice Surrounds Shikotan

Dust off Oman.title: Dust off Oman

Heavy Snow on the Korean Peninsula.title: Heavy Snow on the Korean Peninsula
Heavy Snow on the Korean Peninsula.caption_short: Acquired February 15, 2011, this natural-color image shows snowfall along the east coast of the Korean Peninsula.

Emi Koussi Volcano, Chad.title: Emi Koussi Volcano, Chad

Porto Praia, Santiago, Cape Verde.title: Porto Praia, Santiago, Cape Verde

Flooding in Caprivi, Namibia.title: Flooding in Caprivi, Namibia
